title: Best developer tutorials
comment: YouTube channel: WebDevSimplified is pretty dang rad. Guy talks fast but conveys things succinctly and clearly. Worth a gander.

title: Apollo / GraphQL for a small Mom & Pop website?
comment: Seems to me like a whole extra layer of code when simple Sequelize or Mongoose is quick and efficient enough for small data sets.

title: Bootcamp Blues
comment: I should have listened when they said to stay on top of homework - Here I am with 2 weeks left and 3 assignments to complete for which I've partly forgotten the proficiencies.

title: ChatGPT for explanation of code?
comment: It's been a life-saver for quickly understanding a code block. Now I just have to remember to use it versus Google!

title: PWAs
comment: I'm not convinced that having a desktop icon which is basically just a shortcut to a web app is all that cool.
